statements: UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET energy_consumed = 150 WHERE location = 'Kitchen' AND timestamp = '2022-05-10 08:00:00';
UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET location = 'Living Room', energy_consumed = 200 WHERE timestamp = '2022-05-12 14:30:00';

UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET consumption = 1000.50 WHERE city = 'New York' AND date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE sensors SET status = 'Active', location = 'Building A' WHERE sensor_id = 101;
UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET consumption = 1500.75, city = 'New York' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sensors SET status = 'active', location = 'Building A', type = 'Temperature Sensor' WHERE sensor_id = 3;
UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET energy_reading = 200.50 WHERE city_id = 1
UPDATE city_details SET country = 'USA', city_name = 'New York' WHERE city_id = 1
UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET energy_reading = 1500.56, timestamp = '2023-07-15' WHERE city_id = 1;
UPDATE city_details SET country = 'United States', city_name = 'New York' WHERE city_id = 2;
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_usage = 1500.75 WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
UPDATE Buildings SET building_type = 'Office Building', construction_year = 2000 WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles';
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_usage = 1500.75 WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE EnergyProviders SET energy_source = 'Solar' WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles';
UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET energy_usage = 150.75 WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:00:00' AND device_id = 101

UPDATE energy_consumption_data
SET energy_usage = 50.75
WHERE timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' AND device_id = 1234

UPDATE smart_devices
SET installation_date = '2022-10-01'
WHERE device_id = 5678
